segments.text: I see sunlight coming in through the window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sight of the overflowing sink makes my stomach drop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amazing how absorbed the woman is, failing to notice anything amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a recipe for disaster, and I can’t help but smile at the children’s mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so intent on getting to those cookies, it’s almost charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the instability of that stool makes me feel uneasy; I just want him to succeed without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, waiting so patiently, just heightens that sense of drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
